content.text: Match ends, Barcelona B 4, Almería 5.
Second Half ends, Barcelona B 4, Almería 5.
Verza (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Rafinha (Barcelona B) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Leonardo Ulloa (Almería).
Offside, Almería. Hernán Pellerano tries a through ball, but Leonardo Ulloa is caught offside.
Goal!  Barcelona B 4, Almería 5. Gerard Deulofeu (Barcelona B) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left to the bottom right corner following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona B. Conceded by Rafita.
Goal!  Barcelona B 3, Almería 5. Christian Fernández (Almería) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Verza with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Almería. Joselu replaces Aarón Ñíguez.
